text: The Little Match Girl (Danish: Den lille pige med svovlstikkerne) is a 1953 Danish short adventure film directed by Johan Jacobsen. It is based on Hans Christian Andersen's story The Little Match Girl.Goble p.859 ==Cast== * Liselotte Krefeld as the little girl * Agnes Thorberg Wieth as grandmother == References == == Bibliography == * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. == External links == * Category:1953 films Category:Danish films Category:Danish-language films Category:Danish short films Category:Films based on The Little Match Girl Category:Films directed by Johan Jacobsen
title: The Little Match Girl (1953 film)
